mapper.insert: insert into checked(id, content, checked, time, checker_username, writer_username, group_id) values(#{id}, #{content}, 0, #{time}, #{checker_username}, #{writer_username}, #{group_id});
mapper.update: update checklist set checked = 1 where checked = 0; update checklist set checked = 0 where checked = 1;
mapper.select: select id, content, checked, time, checker_username, writer_username, group_id from checklist where gropu_id=#{group_id};
